title: Bad Boys
creator_credit: Doug Richardson, Bobbie Read, Jim Mulholland, John Vallone, Michael Barrie, Michael Bay, Don Simpson, George Gallo, Jerry Bruckheimer, Sony Pictures, Don Simpson/Jerry Bruckheimer Films and Columbia Pictures
brief_description: Marcus Burnett is a hen-pecked family man. Mike Lowry is a foot-loose and fancy free ladies’ man. Both are Miami policemen, and both have 72 hours to reclaim a consignment of drugs stolen from under their station’s nose. To complicate matters, in order to get the assistance of the sole witness to a murder, they have to pretend to be each other.

constellations_other.name: Jan Chapman
constellations_other.description: From an independent Sydney cinema to the world's stage, Jan Chapman's work has many connections to the Australian film scene and Hollywood.
